title: Cartoons, Cleanups, and Close Calls
teaser:
A jack-of-all-trades enters a cartoon contest, a teacherâ€™s pet is invited to do a special project, a girl from Queens learns to think big, and a woman walking alone at night faces her worst fears. Hosted by Moth Senior Producer, Jenifer Hixson.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.
description: Matthew Diffee decides to become a cartoonist.Ijeoma Oluo realizes that a school teacher was trying to be charitable.Tara Clancy lives a dual lifestyle growing up in Queens and The Hamptons.Nancy Finton narrowly escapes an attacker.When offensive or FCC-prohibited words appear, they are bleeped and listed in the Content Advisory.  Sensitive content will be given an on-air caution and will be noted here in the description.
contentencoded:
Matthew Diffee decides to become a cartoonist.

Ijeoma Oluo realizes that a school teacher was trying to be charitable.

Tara Clancy lives a dual lifestyle growing up in Queens and The Hamptons.

Nancy Finton narrowly escapes an attacker.

When offensive or FCC-prohibited words appear, they are bleeped and listed in the Content Advisory.  Sensitive content will be given an on-air caution and will be noted here in the description.
